reasoning.completeness: Gold Answer covers 7 key points: (1) exercise-triggered [P-3,P-6,P-41], (2) episodic/reversible with rest [P-6,P-33], (3) cold weather [P-38], (4) multiple settings [P-38], (5) seasonal allergies [P-35,P-36], (6) nocturnal episode [P-43,P-44], (7) pertinent negatives [P-7,P-8,P-10,P-31]. reasoning.faithfulness: All cited transcript excerpts [P-1,P-2,P-3,P-35,P-36,P-38] accurately match the source transcript content. Minor unverifiable addition of 'symptoms directly linked in the Knowledge Graph' (no such graph in transcript), but no other hallucinations; claims are grounded.

summary: The Generated Answer is mostly correct and relevant but incomplete in covering all key supportive points from the Gold Answer, with minor faithfulness issues.
